name: Saransh Choudhary
Devesh Upreti
Manvendra Rawat
extra:
Hey!
We are SpitHope, a Power Thrash Metal band based in NCR region. We aim to be stylistically unique about our sound. To best define our music, it's a progressive take on traditional thrash metal. 
We've released two three tracks from our upcoming EP 'Care is Fictional'. And are working towards recording the rest of the tracks. 
https://www.facebook.com/SpittingHope/

The links to two of our released tracks are given below:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l3lpl40sTO8&t=306s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0YqaNhScWI

You can check out our website for further queries.
spittinghope.wixsite.com/spithope-1
